codeFragments.label: 2 install
codeFragments.content:
cd src\apache-http docker build -t tfenster/apache . code-insiders.cmd Dockerfile docker run tfenster/apache docker ps docker exec sharp_goldstine ipconfig http://172.29.185.125 docker exec -ti sharp_goldstine powershell cd c:\Apache24\htdocs '

Hello MVPDays

' | Out-File index.html docker rm -f sharp_goldstine

codeFragments.label: 3 copy
codeFragments.content:
cd ..\hostname-app
docker build -t tfenster/hostname-app .
code-insiders.cmd Dockerfile
code-insiders.cmd default.aspx
docker run --name hostnametest --hostname hostnametest tfenster/hostname-app
docker exec hostnametest ipconfig
http://172.29.180.80
docker exec -ti hostnametest powershell
docker rm -f hostnametest

codeFragments.label: 4 build multi-stage
codeFragments.content:
cd ../aspnetapp
docker build -t tfenster/aspnetapp .
code-insiders.cmd Dockerfile
docker run tfenster/aspnetapp
docker ps
docker exec sharp_fermi ipconfig
http://172.29.187.82
docker rm -f sharp_fermi

codeFragments.label: 5 compose
codeFragments.content:
cd ..\signup
docker build -t tfenster/signup-web .
code-insiders.cmd Dockerfile
docker-compose up -d
code-insiders.cmd docker-compose.yml
docker exec signup_signup-web_1 ipconfig
http://172.29.186.98
docker exec signup_signup-db_1 ipconfig
"C:\Program Files\sqlops-windows\sqlops.exe"
docker-compose down
